overview: The West is still wild! Country living certainly produces plenty of beautiful girls. Watch Midwest farmer's daughters wash off the sweat of the dust bowl after doing chores. A leisurely nap on the open plain turns into quite the siesta. Enjoy a rousing round of strip poker. Leather clad gals and denim skirted cowgirls expose what's really underneath that ten-gallon hat! So giddy-up partner and join us in a romping good time!
title: Prairie Gals
